Content: At the risk of starting a long drawn out thread similar to asking about one's preferred oil, I thought I would ask everyone what brand of motorcycle tires they prefer. I am getting new tires and had selected some Dunlops, but the salesman talked me into some more expensive Michelins. The stock tyres on my Triumph were Metzlers and they were fine. I usually use Bridgestone or Shinko tires on my dirtbikes. When buying car tires, I have a favorite local tire shop and buy the mid-priced tires that the shop has in stock or can get quickly. I generally don't have a brand loyalty or preference. Just curious what everyone else thinks or does with respect to tires. Of course, comparisons would have to be made using equivalent grades of tires.
